title: Azeri Olympic gold wrestlers to win luxurious car
description: BAKU， July 26 (Xinhua) -- Any Azeri wrestler， who wins Olympic gold medal in London， will be awarded a Porsche Cayenne， Azerbaijan Wrestling Federation announced on Thursday in a statement.
cleanContent: BAKU, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Any Azeri wrestler, who wins Olympic gold medal in London, will be awarded a Porsche Cayenne, Azerbaijan Wrestling Federation announced on Thursday in a statement.In addition, the Azeri government vowed to pay 400,000 Azerbaijani manats to every Azerbaijani Olympic athlete for per gold medal. Besides, 200,000 Azerbaijani manats will be paid to the gold medalists by the country's National Olympic Committee.Some 53 Azeri athletes have been qualified for the 2012 Olympic Games, which will start on 27 July in London.One U.S. dollar is equal to 0.78 Azerbaijani manats. <strong style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><strong style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">																																																																								|  |
